subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Gary Stal of France came from 10 shots behind to capitalize on an improbable meltdown by Martin Kaymer and win the Abu Dhabi Championship in the United Arab Emirates after a frantic final round.
snippet: Gary Stal of France came from 10 shots behind to capitalize on an improbable meltdown by Martin Kaymer and win the Abu Dhabi Championship in the United Arab Emirates after a frantic final round.
